title: Your AI Assistant in the Browser
description: Get instant AI-powered analysis and insights directly in your browser. Fast, accurate, and always ready to help.
instant_analysis_desc: Get AI-powered insights and analysis with just one click, right in your browser.
lightning_fast_desc: Optimized for speed and performance, get results in milliseconds.
works_everywhere_desc: Compatible with all major browsers and websites.
see_action_desc: Experience the power of AI analysis right in your browser. Get instant insights and results with a single click.
ready_to_start_desc: Install our browser extension now and experience the power of AI at your fingertips.
how_to_install_desc: Watch this quick video to learn how to install and set up our AI Assistant extension:
built_with_copyq: Built with CopyQ. All rights reserved.
